'Workman Publishing Company' is a publisher of primarily non-fiction print and
audio books along with calendars with annual sales of over US$25 million.
Located in New York City, New York, USA, the publisher works under several
imprints with offices located throughout the United States. Peter Workman
founded the company in 1968 when he published the book Yoga 28-Day Exercise
Plan. As of July 2007, two-thirds of the books published by the company remained
in print. {{cite web| title=Company Factsheet | url=http://www.hoovers.com/workman-publishing/--ID__117117--/free-co-
factsheet.xhtml?cm_ven=Biz_Dev&cm_cat=Google&cm_pla=Free&cm_ite=Factsheet | accessdate=2007-07-
07 | date=2007-07-07 |work=Hoovers |publisher=D&B Company }}
categories: Publishing companies of the United States
